content: the crocheting guidance available as following part 1 https //youtu be/s2vk0gld9w0 part 2 https //youtu be/tw86up_rbxg **yarn kit** shop on susan s family 5% off ship to us&eu https //susudiy myshopify com/products/goldfish-egg-bag _pos=1&_psq=goldfish+egg&_ss=e&_v=1 0 **accessory bag** https //susudiy myshopify com/products/goldfish-egg-pouch-accessory-bag chinese traditional culture divides the year into 24 solar terms among which the *beginning of summer* signals the onset of the summer season *dragon boat festival* a significant holiday for the chinese during early summer is celebrated accordingly weaving **egg pouch** around the time of the beginning of summer and the dragon boat festival has been a widespread folk custom in the vast region of jiangnan hanging these egg pouches around children s necks during the festivities symbolizes wishes for **health** and **safety** designed in the shape of a golden fish this particular egg pouch incorporates beads gold threads sequins and other embellishments making it not only vivid and aesthetically pleasing but also imbued with auspicious meanings the crocheting guidance will guide you step by step through completing this project and we hope that during the process you discover even more joy in the colors and stitching techniques used please visit our youtube channel - susan s family to view them you can also find us at https //www instagram com/susansfamily2013/ more product can be found in this account please remember to subscribe & turn on notifications if you d like to know immediately when there s anew video up
